ygData.subject: Re: Hey, I'm the new guy.
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome in, Wasp. ... Kluster looks down at the screen as he recieves another transmission. A new Maximal. Welcome to earth, her replies, I am Kluster,

Welcome in, Wasp.

::Kluster::

Kluster looks down at the screen as he recieves another transmission. 
A new Maximal.

"Welcome to earth," her replies, "I am Kluster, commander of the 
Cybertronian Fire. I'll send you the coordinates to base."

He ends the transmission after sending the coordinates of the CF.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Waspinator9063@a... wrote:
> ((OOC: Hey yall. I'm going to join your RPG. I've been in Space 
Station 
> Omicron for about a year, and the lack of people makes it too 
predicatable. 
> Is it possible to know what is the situation going on?))
> 
> BIC: Hurtling through the atmosphere at breakneck speeds, a stasis 
pod 
> crashes into a puddle of filth. As the door opens, a haggard, 
tired, and old 
> warrior steps out of the craft. It was Thrust, legendary Vehicon, 
and really 
> cranky biker. Megatron had made a backup data file of the spark of 
> Waspinator, and made Thrust in the battle for the sparks. Now, the 
data had 
> attached itself to a spark void of life, and had recreated the 
biker we all 
> know and hate. "Hello? Is anyone alive on this planet? Anyone? Come 
in! I am 
> Thrust,  vehicon general." He spoke into a comlink, and prayed for 
an answer. 
> You see, the Maximals had kicked him off Cybertron when they 
discovered his 
> precence in "THE BIG GIANT MEGATRON HEAD"
> 
> 
> On a totally different plain, another pod crashes. A reinforcement, 
trained 
> in the martial arts on earth in the great war steps out. He is a 
Maximal. He 
> breathes in the air, and sighs. He pulls up a data file, and can 
find no 
> surviving crew members from team DINOBOT (his old guerilla force) 
on the 
> planet. He called into a comlink, on a Maximal 
frequency. "SlashStrike here. 
> Looking for Maximal base. My cohorts on Kaytry moon have alerted me 
of the 
> war, and I think I am here to kick some tail. Reply with 
coordinates to your 
> base, if any. I am eager to join, and eager to win this war, for 
the rightful 
> squad-- THE MAXIMALS!"
